  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptsCalibrePlugin
    Represents an object which accepts a plugin field of type CalibrePlugin.
    AcceptsCalibrePluginAdapter
    Type adapter for providing AcceptsCalibrePlugin with plugin fields during deserialization.
    ActionSystem  
    Animation  
    Animation.Frame  
    AnimationAdapter  
    AnimationStat  
    Blueprint
    Represents a premade structure of components.
    BlueprintCreationException  
    CalibreCommand
    The plugin's command handler.
    CalibreComponent
    A component, which can be nested to create component trees.
    CalibreComponentAdapter
    Type and item adapter for CalibreComponents.
    CalibreComponentSlot
    A slot which can hold a CalibreComponent.
    CalibreDamageProvider  
    CalibreDamageService
    Provides a method to damage entities.
    CalibreDefaultHook
    The default CalibreHook.
    CalibreHook
    A hook onto CalibrePlugin which can modify things at enable-time.
    CalibreIdentifiable
    A tag interface for a generic Calibre object which: has an ID must be validated on load accepts a CalibrePlugin
    CalibreItem
    A class for a generic CalibreItemSupplier which: provides a way to call Events to this item
    CalibreItemSupplier
    A class for a generic CalibreIdentifiable which: can be converted to an ItemStack
    CalibreLocalized
    A generic Calibre object which has a localizable name.
    CalibrePlayer
    Wrapper around Player for storing Calibre's data.
    CalibrePlugin
    The main plugin class.
    CalibreProtocol  
    CalibreSoundData  
    CalibreSystem<D>
    A system that can interact with a CalibreComponent through: Running code on event calls (right click, hold, etc.) Accepting custom data on deserialization Providing stat definitions
    ComponentCreationException  
    ComponentDescriptor
    Can create a CalibreComponent if provided with a Registry.
    ComponentDescriptorAdapter
    Type adapter for ComponentDescriptors.
    ComponentTree
    Represents the context of a component in a tree with other components.
    DataStat<E>  
    DataStat.Particle  
    DataStat.Sound  
    DefaultEventHandle
    The CalibreDefaultHook's event handler.
    DefaultPacketAdapter  
    EventHandle
    The plugin's event handler.
    FireableSystem  
    ItemDescriptor
    A description of an ItemStack.
    ItemEvents
    Contains all generic item events that a CalibreSystem can listen to.
    ItemEvents.BukkitDamage  
    ItemEvents.BukkitDamage.Listener  
    ItemEvents.BukkitInteract
    Bukkit event-based version of ItemEvents.Interact.
    ItemEvents.BukkitInteract.Listener  
    ItemEvents.BukkitSwapHands
    Bukkit event-based version of ItemEvents.SwapHands.
    ItemEvents.BukkitSwapHands.Listener  
    ItemEvents.Damage
    Runs when an entity is damaged by another entity with an item.
    ItemEvents.Damage.Listener  
    ItemEvents.EntityEvent<T>
    The base class for all item events involving an entity.
    ItemEvents.Equip
    Runs when an item is equipped by a player in any EquipmentSlot.
    ItemEvents.Equip.Listener  
    ItemEvents.Event<T>
    The base class for all item events.
    ItemEvents.Interact
    Runs when an item is left or right clicked.
    ItemEvents.Interact.Listener  
    ItemEvents.PlayerEvent<T>
    The base class for all item events involving a player.
    ItemEvents.SwapHands
    Runs when an item is swapped from the main to offhand and vice versa.
    ItemEvents.SwapHands.Listener  
    ItemRepresentation
    Represents a linked pair of ItemStack and CalibreItem, which map to each other.
    MeleeSystem  
    MeleeSystem.Events  
    MeleeSystem.Events.Swing
    Runs when a component with a MeleeSystem is left-clicked or damages an entity.
    MeleeSystem.Events.Swing.Listener  
    RegistryCommandContext<T extends me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable>  
    SlotViewGUI
